code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TeamForm(_ref){let{onSubmit,selectedTeam,clearSelection}=_ref;const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:'',city:'',coach:'',founded_year:''});useEffect(()=>{if(selectedTeam){setFormData(selectedTeam);}},[selectedTeam]);const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData(prev=>({...prev,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!formData.name.trim()){alert('Team name is required');return;}onSubmit(formData);setFormData({name:'',city:'',coach:'',founded_year:''});if(clearSelection)clearSelection();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"team-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"name",value:formData.name,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Team Name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"city",value:formData.city,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"City"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"coach",value:formData.coach,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Coach"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"founded_year",type:"number",value:formData.founded_year,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Founded Year"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:selectedTeam?'Update Team':'Add Team'})]});}export default TeamForm;
